statements: SELECT * FROM VendorPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_rating FROM VendorPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_rating FROM VendorPerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT vendor_name, AVG(performance_rating) AS average_rating FROM VendorPerformanceMetrics GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM VendorPerformanceMetrics WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM VendorPerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC, performance_date ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_rating FROM VendorPerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM VendorPerformanceMetrics GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING avg_rating > 3 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, performance_rating, performance_date FROM VendorPerformanceMetrics WHERE vendor_name LIKE '%son%' ORDER BY performance_date ASC, performance_rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, performance_rating FROM VendorPerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance_metrics ORDER BY vendor_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id,vendor_name,delivery_performance FROM vendor_performance_metrics WHERE delivery_performance > 80
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance_metrics WHERE quality_performance < 70 ORDER BY quality_performance DESC
SELECT vendor_name, quality_performance, delivery_performance FROM vendor_performance_metrics WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, vendor_name FROM vendor_performance_metrics WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance_metrics WHERE quality_performance > 90;
SELECT vendor_name, delivery_performance, quality_performance FROM vendor_performance_metrics WHERE delivery_performance < 75 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;

SELECT vendor_name, evaluation_date, overall_performance FROM vendor_performance_metrics JOIN procurement_evaluation ON vendor_performance_metrics.id = procurement_evaluation.vendor_id WHERE overall_performance BETWEEN 80 AND 90 ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, delivery_performance, quality_performance FROM vendor_performance_metrics WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' OR vendor_name LIKE 'B%' AND quality_performance < 80;
SELECT DISTINCT vendor_name FROM vendor_performance_metrics WHERE delivery_performance > 85 OR quality_performance > 85 ORDER BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM VendorMetrics;
SELECT vendor_name, total_orders FROM VendorMetrics WHERE total_orders > 100;
SELECT * FROM OrderMetrics ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, total_orders, average_lead_time FROM SupplierMetrics WHERE total_orders BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT vendor_name, total_orders, total_spent FROM VendorMetrics WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT vendor_name, total_orders FROM VendorMetrics
SELECT * FROM OrderMetrics ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT supplier_name, average_lead_time FROM SupplierMetrics WHERE total_orders > 10
SELECT vendor_name, total_spent FROM VendorMetrics WHERE total_spent > 1000
SELECT * FROM OrderMetrics WHERE order_total BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM vendor_metrics;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_rating FROM vendor_metrics ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_metrics WHERE sales_volume > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_volume FROM product_metrics WHERE performance_rating > 8;
SELECT supplier_name, performance_rating FROM supplier_metrics WHERE performance_rating < 5 ORDER BY performance_rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_metrics ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, performance_rating, sales_volume FROM product_metrics WHERE sales_volume > 1000 ORDER BY sales_volume DESC;

SELECT vendor_name, performance_rating, satisfaction_rating FROM vendor_metrics INNER JOIN procurement_metrics ON vendor_metrics.vendor_id = procurement_metrics.vendor_id WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_id FROM supplier_metrics ORDER BY supplier_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vendor_name, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM vendor_metrics GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING avg_rating > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM Vendor;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_address FROM Vendor ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_address FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_address FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_address, vendor_id FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_id > 2 ORDER BY vendor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Vendor ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_address FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM SupplierOrders;
SELECT vendor_name, quality_rating, delivery_rating FROM VendorRating WHERE quality_rating > 4 AND delivery_rating > 3;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM SupplierOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 3;
